languages.text: Темные легенды гласят, что первенец, в жилах которого смешалась кровь Домин и Кибеллы, был взращен не в покоях Лорд-капитана, но в храме Неумирающего, потому как с младенчества был обещан Кровавой паутине. Дитя сие выросло, не ведая о благородстве своей крови, но ведая о своем долге, ибо Неумирающий и есть долг.

Dark legends say that the firstborn in whom the Domin and Kibellah's blood commingled was not raised in the Lord Captain's chambers but at the temple of the Undying One, as the child had been promised to the Bloodspun Web in their infancy. They grew up unaware of their noble bloodline, but aware of their duty, for the Undying One is duty itself.
languages.original_text: Темные легенды гласят, что первенец, в жилах которого смешалась кровь Домин и Кибеллы, был взращен не в покоях Лорд-капитана, но в храме Неумирающего, потому как с младенчества был обещан Кровавой паутине. languages.text: Dunkle Legenden besagen, dass der Erstgeborene, in dem das Blut {mf|des|der} Domin mit Kibellahs Lebenssaft verschmolz, nicht in den Gemächern des Lord Captains aufwuchs, sondern im Tempel des Todlosen, da das Kind dem Blutgesponnenen Netz versprochen war. Und so ahnte es nichts von seiner edlen Blutlinie, wusste aber um seine Pflicht, denn der Todlose selbst ist Pflicht.
languages.original_text: Dark legends say that the firstborn in whom the Domin and Kibellah's blood commingled was not raised in the Lord Captain's chambers but at the temple of the Undying One, as the child had been promised to the Bloodspun Web in their infancy. They grew up unaware of their noble bloodline, but aware of their duty, for the Undying One is duty itself.

traits.locale_text: Dunkle Legenden besagen, dass der Erstgeborene, in dem das Blut {mf|des|der} Domin mit Kibellahs Lebenssaft verschmolz, nicht in den Gemächern des Lord Captains aufwuchs, sondern im Tempel des Todlosen, da das Kind dem Blutgesponnenen Netz versprochen war. Und so ahnte es nichts von seiner edlen Blutlinie, wusste aber um seine Pflicht, denn der Todlose selbst ist Pflicht.

languages.text: À en croire d'obscures légendes, le premier enfant né des amours {mf|du|de la} Domin et Kibellah ne fut pas élevé dans les quartiers {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneur-capitaine}, mais dans un temple de l'Immortel, lui qui avait été promis dès sa naissance à la Toile de Sang. C'est ainsi qu'il grandit dans l'ignorance de sa noble ascendance, mais dans la pleine conscience de son devoir, dont l'Immortel est l'incarnation suprême.
languages.original_text: Dark legends say that the firstborn in whom the Domin and Kibellah's blood commingled was not raised in the Lord Captain's chambers but at the temple of the Undying One, as the child had been promised to the Bloodspun Web in their infancy. They grew up unaware of their noble bloodline, but aware of their duty, for the Undying One is duty itself.

traits.locale_text: À en croire d'obscures légendes, le premier enfant né des amours {mf|du|de la} Domin et Kibellah ne fut pas élevé dans les quartiers {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneur-capitaine}, mais dans un temple de l'Immortel, lui qui avait été promis dès sa naissance à la Toile de Sang. C'est ainsi qu'il grandit dans l'ignorance de sa noble ascendance, mais dans la pleine conscience de son devoir, dont l'Immortel est l'incarnation suprême.

languages.text: Una serie de oscuras leyendas dicen que el primogénito de la unión entre las sangres de Kibellah y su Domin no se crio en los aposentos de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, sino en el templo del Inmortal, ya que el niño había sido prometido a la Red Sanguinolenta en su infancia. Creció sin ser consciente de su noble linaje, pero plenamente conocedor de su deber. Pues el Inmortal es deber.
languages.original_text: Dark legends say that the firstborn in whom the Domin and Kibellah's blood commingled was not raised in the Lord Captain's chambers but at the temple of the Undying One, as the child had been promised to the Bloodspun Web in their infancy. They grew up unaware of their noble bloodline, but aware of their duty, for the Undying One is duty itself.

traits.locale_text: Una serie de oscuras leyendas dicen que el primogénito de la unión entre las sangres de Kibellah y su Domin no se crio en los aposentos de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, sino en el templo del Inmortal, ya que el niño había sido prometido a la Red Sanguinolenta en su infancia. Creció sin ser consciente de su noble linaje, pero plenamente conocedor de su deber. Pues el Inmortal es deber.

languages.text: 暗黒の伝説によれば、ドミンとキベラの血が結びついた長子は、ロード・キャプテンの部屋ではなく、幼い頃にブラッドスパン・ウェブに約束されたことから、不死の者の神殿で育ったという。彼は自分の高貴な血筋を知らずに育ったものの、その義務は自覚していた。なぜなら不死の者は義務そのものであったのだから。
languages.original_text: Dark legends say that the firstborn in whom the Domin and Kibellah's blood commingled was not raised in the Lord Captain's chambers but at the temple of the Undying One, as the child had been promised to the Bloodspun Web in their infancy. They grew up unaware of their noble bloodline, but aware of their duty, for the Undying One is duty itself.

traits.locale_text: 暗黒の伝説によれば、ドミンとキベラの血が結びついた長子は、ロード・キャプテンの部屋ではなく、幼い頃にブラッドスパン・ウェブに約束されたことから、不死の者の神殿で育ったという。彼は自分の高貴な血筋を知らずに育ったものの、その義務は自覚していた。なぜなら不死の者は義務そのものであったのだから。

languages.text: 根据阴暗的传言，绮贝菈与秘者的长子并不是在行商浪人的房间里长大的，而是在不死之神的圣殿之中被抚养成人的。秘者遵守了承诺，将那个婴儿托付给了织血罗网。那个孩子长大成人之后，并不了解自己高贵的血统，但很清楚自己应付的责任，因为不死之神就是责任本身。
languages.original_text: Dark legends say that the firstborn in whom the Domin and Kibellah's blood commingled was not raised in the Lord Captain's chambers but at the temple of the Undying One, as the child had been promised to the Bloodspun Web in their infancy. They grew up unaware of their noble bloodline, but aware of their duty, for the Undying One is duty itself.

traits.locale_text: 根据阴暗的传言，绮贝菈与秘者的长子并不是在行商浪人的房间里长大的，而是在不死之神的圣殿之中被抚养成人的。秘者遵守了承诺，将那个婴儿托付给了织血罗网。那个孩子长大成人之后，并不了解自己高贵的血统，但很清楚自己应付的责任，因为不死之神就是责任本身。

languages.text: Karanlık efsaneler, Domin ve Kibellah'nın soyundan doğacak ilk çocuğun Lord Kaptan'ın odasında değil, bebekliğinden itibaren Kanipi Ağı'na vadedilen bir çocuk olarak Ölmeyen'in tapınağında yetiştirileceğini anlatır. Soylu neslinden habersiz ancak vazifesinin bilincinde olarak büyüyeceği söylenir. Zira Ölmeyen, vazifenin ta kendisidir.
languages.original_text: Dark legends say that the firstborn in whom the Domin and Kibellah's blood commingled was not raised in the Lord Captain's chambers but at the temple of the Undying One, as the child had been promised to the Bloodspun Web in their infancy. They grew up unaware of their noble bloodline, but aware of their duty, for the Undying One is duty itself.
